altTitles.ja: アカアカトシタチノモノガタリ

altTitles.ja-ro: Akaaka to Shita Chi no Monogatari

description.en:
Itsuki and Hayato, two brothers who grew up in a village nestled deep in the mountains, set out to hunt down a wolf that has been attacking the livestock of the village.  
  
Itsuki is about to go in for the kill when a gigantic beast appears out of nowhere, snatching up the wolf in its jaws and sucking the life out of it.  
  
The beast that stared Itsuki down was a gargantuan, blood-sucking vampire deer…  
  
Will the two brothers be able to return to the village alive ?!  
  
Find out in this blood-filled action-packed story by extraordinary mangaka Kaishaku !
description.pt-br: Itsuki e Hayato, dois amigos que cresceram em uma aldeia situada nas montanhas partiram para caçar um lobo que tem atacado o gado da aldeia. Itsuki está prestes a mata-lo quando um animal gigantesco aparece do nada, pegando o lobo em suas mandíbulas e sugando a vida dele. A besta que olhou para Itsuki foi um gigantesco cervo vampiro... Será que os dois amigos serão capaz de voltar para a aldeia vivos?! Descubra nesta história cheia de ação e de sangue pelo mangaká extraordinário Kaishaku!

altTitles.ja: にゃっと

description.en: Yaneda Shigeru is a guy living alone with his cat, Konbu, until she turns mostly into a human (she keeps her cat tail and ears) for unknown reasons. Though to Shigeru, this isn't a problem; he has a cat-girl fetish. The problem is, Konbu is stuck-up and wants everything to be elegant to fit her high-class tastes, even her name to be something more high-class. So, they each want to mold each other to their tastes; Shigeru an elegant butler, and Konbu an obedient, cute cat-girl. Will one of them win, or will they come to some sort of mutual understanding?

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

description.en: Godai, a policeman, who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?
description.ja: 犯人への過剰暴力が原因で左遷させられた熱血刑事の五代。新たな上司は自称“超能力捜査官”の飛高警視正。赴任早々、五代はとある連続殺人事件へと潜入捜査を命じられるのだが…!?

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

altTitles.ja: Minamike
みなみけ
南家

description.en:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

altTitles.ja: お兄さんのざぁこざぁこ♡
入学傭兵

altTitles.th: พี่ชายสายบอดี้การ์ด

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

title.en: Osoroshii Ningen: Ningyo to Otokonoko no Ohanashi

altTitles.ja: おそろしい人間 人魚と男の子のお話

altTitles.ja-ro: Osoroshii Ningen: Ningyo to Otokonoko no Ohanashi.

altTitles.en: "A Terrifying Human: A Story of a Mermaid and a Boy."
A Story of a Mermaid and a Boy.

description.en:
Ha Jae, who’s contemplating death on the rooftop due to bullying. A senior appears before him and suddenly pushes Ha-Jae off?! But, he wakes up safely in the Nurse’s Office in school. Ha-Jae’s retaliation against the bullying that the delinquents have started again ends in failure…

But, Siwoon appears before him yet again and coaches Ha-Jae to defeat the delinquents in one strike using his fist.

The presence of the Murim appears hidden under what seems to be an ordinary school, and the perilous adventure to the world of Murim begins.

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!

description.en:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
description.ja: 現実の女に興味無し！俺の嫁・リリエルは2次元にあり！そんな漫研部長・奥村の前に現れたのは…リアルなリリエル？ドキドキコスプレコメディ開幕！
description.pt:
"Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu Liliel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu… uma Liliel real?  
Uma super comédia empolgante começa!
description.pt-br: "Eu não estou interessado em uma mulher real! Minha waifu, Liriel está no mundo 2D!" Okumura, presidente do clube de mangá, um dia na sua frente apareceu... uma Liriel real? Uma super comédia empolgante começa!

description.en:
Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy! Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research! Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?!

[MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)
description.es: Ryouma Takuma, es un hombre de 39 años de edad con un pasado misterioso; se encuentra en una extraña habitación desconocida, donde los dioses le dicen que ha muerto y van a enviar su alma a un mundo diferente, al despertar convertido en un niño y en medio de un bosque va descubriendo su afinidad por domesticar monstruos y en particular slimes.
description.fr: Ryouma Takuma, un esclave de bureau de 39 ans, se réveille dans une étrange pièce blanche. Les Dieux lui annoncent qu’il est mort et qu’ils vont envoyer son âme dans un autre monde, où la magie existe. Se réveillant dans le corps d’un jeune garçon avec l’expérience de sa vie passée et de nouvelles habilités données par les Dieux, Ryouma se découvre une affinité avec la capture de monstre, et tout particulièrement avec les slimes! Suivez les aventures de Ryouma et de ses slimes, plus impressionnants qu’il n’y paraît, dans ce nouveau monde!
description.ja: 日本の中年サラリーマン竹林竜馬は、死後、三柱の神に協力を求められ、子どもの姿で異世界へ転生！　森で一人、のんびり暮らし始めた竜馬は、魔法でテイムしたスライムたちの研究にのめり込んで行き…。
description.ru: Рёма Такума, 39 летний человек, оказался в странной белой комнате. Боги говорят ему, что он умер и посылают его душу в другой мир, мир где существует магия. Живя в одиночестве 3 года, его геймерская душа просто теряет здравый смысл и начинает сумасшедший путь.
description.vi: Ryouma Takebayashi chết trong giấc ngủ ở tuổi 39 sau một cuộc đời đầy bất hạnh. Thương hại anh ta, ba vị thần cho anh ta cơ hội tái sinh trong một thế giới ma thuật, nơi anh ta chỉ có một nhiệm vụ: là chính mình và tận hưởng cuộc sống. Họ ban cho Ryouma khả năng thể chất mạnh mẽ cũng như khả năng thông thạo mọi yếu tố, và hứa sẽ trông chừng cậu. Cuộc sống mới của anh khi còn nhỏ chính thức bắt đầu khi anh bị dịch chuyển vào một khu rừng.Ba năm trôi qua. Dành phần lớn thời gian để nghiên cứu về chất nhờn, Ryouma đã cố gắng phát triển các loại chất nhờn độc đáo, huấn luyện một đội quân trong số họ đồng thời phát triển khả năng ma thuật của mình. Mặc dù cậu bé hạnh phúc với cuộc sống ẩn dật và ngôi nhà trong hang động thoải mái của mình, nhưng cậu hơi nhớ sự đồng hành của con người. Nhưng sau khi chữa trị cho một thành viên bị thương của một nhóm du khách đi ngang qua từ hộ gia đình của một công tước, Ryouma được thuyết phục đi cùng họ và thoát ra khỏi khu rừng cùng với bầy bầy nhầy của mình. Một thế giới hoàn toàn mới đang chờ đợi anh ta, nơi các kỹ năng của anh ta như một người sử dụng ma thuật và người thuần hóa chất nhờn tiếp tục gây ra sự ngạc nhiên và ngưỡng mộ.

altTitles.ja: 十字架のろくにん

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

description.en: Eigo Nitta, new student in Hoyo high school, is enrolled in the baseball team. Talented as fast pitcher but lacking in term of technique, Eigo Nitta aims to be the new pitcher of the team. He has to face many opponents, which creates an atmosphere of competition in the baseball team. However he and his teammates will have to find a way to solve the rivalry among the baseball team in order to go to Koshien tournament.

description.en:
High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)
description.fr:
Makoto Misumi, lycéen japonais de 17 ans de petite taille et vice président du club de kyūdō de son école, se fait envoyer soudainement dans un autre monde par le dieu Tsukuyomi, qui lui apprend que ses parents sont originaires de celui-ci et qu'ils ont conclu un pacte avec la déesse locale pour être envoyé au Japon.

Mais la dite déesse le trouve trop laid pour être un héros dans la guerre entre humains et démons qui déchire son monde et le lâche littéralement dans les confins de celui-ci avec seulement la capacité de comprendre les langues des êtres non-humains. Tsukuyomi intervient et lui donne une partie de sa force.

Makoto rencontrera Ema une orc qui sera sa première amie et fera de Shin, une dragonne qui se métamorphosera en jolie femme, son premier serviteur. Celle-ci voit avec le pouvoir de Makoto un de ses pouvoirs devenir un "autre espace" qui accueillera au fil des rencontres dans ce monde de magie et d'épée de nombreuses personnes.
description.pt-br: O estudante Misumi Makoto é invocado para outro mundo, para ser o herói. Mas a Deusa do outro mundo não gosta desse herói, por isso o envia para o fim do mundo. Agora Makoto tem de encontrar o seu próprio caminho nesse novo mundo de fantasia!

description.en: One day, high schooler Hoshina Shuuji, who can sense peoples' feelings through his ordinary five senses, accidentally sees the popular Ayachi Nene masturbating in the school library. Nene is a member of the Occult Club, and commonly offers her classmates advice through fortune-telling. When Shuuji goes to apologize to her, he learns two things: the Occult Club is going to be closed due to lack of members, and Nene is actually a witch that is collecting 'soul fragments' that come from strong emotions. After he accidentally absorbs her collection of soul fragments, he decides to join her club, help her collect more, and try to find a way to give back the ones he took.

description.en:
Gen Shiomi, the 56-year-old boss of the Hitotsubashi mob syndicate, must go into hiding to protect his life from potential assassins. He opts to get plastic surgery, only to end up looking like a teenage girl, but he resolves to stay like this until his life is no longer in danger. However, he finds it hard to not be suspicious, but he is saved from being the target of police by a teenage boy named Tatsuya Umemiya. After helping Tatsuya out of some troubles of his own, Gen is forced to enroll into junior high school as "Shiomi Iwao", only to discover that one of his new classmates is Tatsuya.

---

description.en:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10570/episode/350366)
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
description.fr: Zig, un mercenaire grand et large d'épaules, participe à une chasse aux sorcières. Après un duel acharné avec la sorcière redoutable, il découvre son désir. "Je veux que tu me protèges," demande-t-elle, fatiguée que sa vie soit prise à la légère. Cherchant un endroit pour survivre, la sorcière et le mercenaire tournent leurs regards vers un continent inconnu !
description.vi:
「Phù thủy」――― Tại Lục địa nơi mà Ma thú lẫn Ma thuật đều đã hoàn toàn biến mất, Phù thủy trở thành thứ sinh vật bí ẩn duy nhất còn tồn tại.

Gig Crain, một Lính đánh thuê sở hữu thân hình cường tráng, đang trên đường tiến tới chinh phạt thứ tồn tại đáng sợ từ thời cổ xưa đó. Khi trận giao chiến khốc liệt khép lại, mặc dù đã giành chiến thắng đầy nhọc nhằn, anh cũng chẳng còn mục đích để xuống tay với Phù thủy nữa. Khi Gig không định kết liễu mà cứ thế rời đi, từ sau bóng lưng anh, Phù thủy có một yêu cầu...

"Tôi muốn anh bảo vệ tôi". Cô mong muốn được sống trong cảnh không bị truy đuổi. Tự giằng co ít lâu, Gig cuối cùng cũng đã chấp thuận yêu cầu đó. Tuy nhiên, không có nơi nào trên Lục địa này mà một Phù thủy, biểu tượng của sự sợ hãi, có thể sống yên ổn. Dẫu vậy, khi việc di chuyển giữa các Lục địa trở nên khả thi trong những năm gần đây, Phù thủy và Lính đánh thuê đã quyết định sẽ lên đường đi tới một Lục địa khác.

Tác phẩm Light Novel được chuyển thể từ Web Novel, nay đã có phiên bản Manga cùng tên!!
description.es-la: Zig, un mercenario alto y de anchos hombros, participa en una caza de brujas. Tras un feroz duelo con la mortífera bruja, se entera de su deseo. "Quiero que me protejas", le pide ella, cansada de que trivialicen su vida. En busca de un lugar donde sobrevivir, la bruja y el mercenario ponen sus miras en un continente desconocido.

description.en:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

description.en:
After surviving a terrorist incident as a child, Shingo Shimazaki was forced to join the League for Economic Liberations' revolutionary army. 

Now, thirty years later, he's back in Japan and trying to assimilate to a normal life. His Japanese may be awkward, and his grasp of ordinary tasks a little weak, but he has all the combat and surveillance training of a green beret. 

There are many kindhearted souls who want to help him - and a few not so kind ones who will do anything to stop him.
description.id: Saat masih kecil, Shimazaki Shingo diculik oleh organisasi teroris internasional dan dibesarkan sebagai agen tempur mereka. Setelah 30 tahun berlalu, akhirnya dia berhasil kembali kampung halamannya yang damai di Jepang.
description.ja: 幼少期に国際テロ組織LELに拉致され、戦闘工作員となった男・島崎真悟。30年の時を経て組織からの脱出に成功した彼は、故郷である日本に帰ってくる。島崎は新天地で“平和”な暮らしを手にできるのか－－。

description.en:
A collection of short shounen-ai stories by Mizushiro Setona, all connected by the theme of plantlife.  
  
[STORY 01] (English Title) Breakfast (Japanese Title) ブレックファスト (Romaji Title) Burekkufasuto   
The tale of a boy who displays the symptoms of man-eating syndrome.  
  
[STORY 02] (English Title) The Tale of the Ring (Japanese Title) 指輪物語 (Romaji Title) Yubiwa Monogatari   
The tale of two boys who are dating each other and mutually hiding the fact that both are dating their teacher, who frets because a ring has been lost.  
  
[STORY 03] (Japanese Title) Honey β   
The tale of a flower that blooms by inhaling memories. But even if our memories are taken from us, some precious things are never forgotten. "I don't fear losing my memory if I can feel this way again tomorrow…"  
  
[STORY 04] (English Title) Undying Illness (Japanese Title) フジノヤマイ (Romaji Title) Fuji no Yamai See "Mister Mermaid," [chapter 2](https://mangadex.org/chapter/dbb15179-44e0-4e5c-9d99-f6f877ef514c/1).
  
[STORY 05] (English Title) Aconite (Japanese Title) トリカブト (Romaji Title) Torikabuto

altTitles.en: I Became a Beautiful Girl, but I’m still an MMO Junkie

altTitles.ja: 美少女になったけど、ネトゲ廃人やってます。

altTitles.ru: Я превратился в красивую девочку, но решил стать задротом!

altTitles.en: I've turned into a bishoujo, but I chose to be an online games addict!

description.en:
The story follows the High-schooler Futsu Jintarou, whose confession was rejected by his crush.

His misfortune continues, as news of a gender-change disease turns Jintarou into a beautiful silver haired girl. The shock of it causes him (her) to try to escape from reality by playing the VRMMO, Clan/Clan…

His game character Taro uses the same girl appearance as in the Real and the Alchemy skill, which most players call a trash skill.  
He meets lots of fellow adventurers, and becomes stronger within the game world of Clan/Clan’s slogan, ‘When one becomes an adventurer, they can fight, steal, control, explore, invent, create, and do anything as they like’.

He meets a wide variety of adventurers that help him (her) grow, Taro hides what happened to his (her) appearance as a bug to his friends who also play the game, and hides the fact that he (she) had become a girl in real life.

When summer break is over, he(she) will have to show their face at school.

This is about one of the best National-class adventurers, the story of the Alchemist who won a war without even taking a single step.  
When a normal high school student suddenly turns into a beautiful girl, what would they do?

The answer is to that is to become an online games' addict!
description.ru: История рассказывает нам о Фуцу Дзинтаро, обычном, среднестатистическом, японском школьнике,  у которого произошло самопроизвольное опорожнение кишечника во время попытки признаться. Но это только начало, так как наш юноша внезапно становится… Беловолосой маленькой девочкой! Шок от этого заставляет его погрузиться в мир VRMMO – Clan/Clan. Его персонаж, Таро, выглядит так же, как и сам Дзинтаро, в нынешнем обличии. Еще он владеет Алхимией, которую все называют худшим скиллом в игре. Он встречает множество искателей приключений и прокачивается дальше. Как говорится в слогане Clan/Clan – “Когда ты становишься искателем приключений – ты можешь сражаться, воровать, исследовать, создавать и делать всё, что тебе захочется!”.  Люди, с которыми он повстречался, помогли ему прокачаться. Таро скрывает, что с ним случилось в реальной жизни, объясняя смену аватара в игре, багом и никому не говорит о том, что он стал девочкой. Но, когда летние каникулы закончатся, ему (ей) предстоит выйти в реальный мир… Что делать обычному школьнику, если он стал девочкой? Правильно! Стать задротом!

altTitles.fr: À la folie... Pas du tout !

altTitles.ja: 狂った王女にはワケがある

altTitles.id: The Princess Pretends to Be Crazy

altTitles.th: องค์หญิงสติเฟื่อง

description.en:
When the emperor declared that his children must battle to become the last remaining heir, the only way Princess Lisbelle could survive was by becoming a mad woman. Feigning insanity kept her out of danger for years, but with only three children remaining, Lisbelle now finds herself a target. In a moment of danger, she discovers powers gifted to her by the goddess Hellare and suddenly finds herself in the company of a charming magician. But whether he’s friend or foe has yet to be determined…

---
"On the Moonlight Garden-! White evening primroses are in full bloom -!"

A strange succession ceremony has all princes and princesses fight each other as only the strongest member of the royal family may succeed the throne. After being poisoned to death, she returned five years into the past and decided to played the part of a crazy b*tch in order to survive. Yet somehow looking like the weakest was still not enough. The crazy princess, with no power or backing, was about to die yet again, but a suspicious wizard suddenly appeared before her.

"What should I do to get your kiss?"

"A deal. If you help me, I'll kiss you."

"Good. I have no intention of letting you die in the hands of anyone besides me."

I feel like I entered the tiger's den while trying to escape the wolves… Is it really okay if I make this deal? A fiery battle and romance between a woman walking towards life with all her might, and a man who lives for death.

---

Коли імператор заявив, що його діти повинні змагатися за престол, єдиним виходом залишитись в живих в цій кривавій баталії для Лісбелль - це стати божевільною. Вдавання з себе божевільної дозволило їй дожити до повноліття, але тепер їх залишилось троє. Зрозуміло, хто стає першою мішенню для братів стає Лісбелль. altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

A dragon expelled from his family because of his cowardliness in search of a new home in a world full of elves, gnomes, orcs and other creatures.

description.ru: Новая сингулярность, которая появилась перед Рицуко Фуджимару, который спас мир. Чтобы исправить искажение истории, Фуджимару, который был перемещен в Синдзюку в 1999 год, встречает одного слугу, который называет себя «Арчер Синдзюку». В городе, где широко распространено зло, открывается занавес истории первого фрагмента!

description.en:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

description.en:
A girl is falling from the sky!? The high school student Suzuki Oji seized the one in a thousand opportunity to start an anime-like love comedy, the girl that fell turned out to be a fellow classmate, Kuromori Kisaki, a girl who's always carrying a broom.  
The youth of a a girl who can't use machines and a meddlesome boy begins!

description.en: After being transported to another world with all of his classmates, Yoshitsune was ordered to conquer the dungeon as a hero. While his peers were all reeled in and tamed by the offer of unlimited sex with the castle maids, Yoshitsune, a low-rank hero, devoted his cheat skills to getting more and more maid wives...
description.id: Setelah dipindahkan ke dunia lain dengan semua teman sekelasnya, Yoshitsune diperintahkan untuk menaklukkan dungeon sebagai pahlawan.  Sementara rekan-rekannya semua tertarik dan dijinakkan oleh tawaran seks tanpa batas dengan para pelayan kastil, Yoshitsune, seorang pahlawan berpangkat rendah, mengabdikan keterampilan curangnya untuk mendapatkan lebih banyak istri pelayan ...
description.ja: クラスメイト全員と共に異世界召喚された義経は、勇者としてダンジョン攻略を命じられることに。メイドさんとエッチし放題というご褒美に釣られ同級生たちが次々と骨抜きにされる中、下級勇者に任命された義経はチートスキルで嫁メイドを増やすことに専念していき…？
description.pt-br: Depois de ser transportado para outro mundo com todos os seus colegas de classe, Yoshitsune foi ordenado a conquistar a masmorra como um herói.  Enquanto seus colegas eram todos atraídos e domados pela oferta de sexo ilimitado com as empregadas do castelo, Yoshitsune, um herói de baixo escalão, dedicou suas habilidades de trapaça para conseguir mais e mais empregadas domésticas...

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: Betrayed by the Hero, I Formed a MILF Party with His Mom!
The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party!

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.

All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en:
Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!

The romantic comedy of a pure-hearted demon's first love, begins!

(Source: Shounen Magazine, translated)
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.es-la: Kanan es un demonio femenino que se esconde en un instituto del mundo humano para alimentarse de almas humanas. Se fija en uno de los chicos del instituto, pero de alguna manera acaba firmando un contrato de amante con él. Pero Kanan, que nunca se ha enamorado, está llena de emociones desconocidas... ¡Una tormenta de juventud agridulce y bromas! Comienza una bonita comedia romántica de primer amor sobre una Akuma de corazón puro...
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

title.en: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ~Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru~

altTitles.ja: ハーレム王の異世界プレス漫遊記 ～最強無双のおじさんはあらゆる種族を嫁にする～

altTitles.en: Harem King's Other World Press Journey: The Strongest Warrior Uncle Takes Wives from All Races

description.en: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
description.es:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!
description.ja: 孤独死してしまった男は女神ニケに「動けるバージョンの種付けおじさん」になりたいと願い、自らにゲンジと名付けて転生した。ニケは上司の女神にお目付け役としてひよこの「ぴのこ」にされてしまいゲンジと行動をともにすることに。ゲンジは冒険者ギルドの受付嬢であるシンディに告白するが、強い男が好きなのと断られてしまう。そこで彼女に受け入れてもらうため、ギルドで噂になっていた最強の黒竜討伐へ向かうことになり――。
description.es-la:
Un hombre que había muerto en soledad pidió a la diosa Nike que lo reencarnara en una «versión variante de un Tanetsuke Ojisan» y se reencarnó con el nombre de Genji.
Nike es convertida en la pollita 'Pinoko' como acompañante por su jefa, la diosa, y tiene que trabajar con Genji.
Tras reencarnarse, Genji confiesa su amor a Cindy, la recepcionista del gremio, pero ella le rechaza, diciendo que le gustan los hombres fuertes. Entonces Genji se marcha a derrotar al dragon negro más fuerte que se rumorea en el gremio.
La comedia erótica de fantasía de un tío con buen corazón que ayuda a los débiles, aplasta a los fuertes y protege a la mujer que le gusta!

title.ja: Chotto Dake Ai ga Omoi Dark Elf ga Isekai Kara Oikakete Kita

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ愛が重いダークエルフが異世界から追いかけてきた

altTitles.en: A Dark Elf with a Slightly Overwhelming Love Chased Me All the Way from Another World
Yandere Dark Elf: She Chased Me All the Way From Another World!

description.en:
Hinata is a high school student who reincarnated into a different world and became a hero by the power of God. He defeated the Demon King with the help of the dark elf Mariabelle and other friends. Thus he safely fulfilled the wishes of God and returned to this world.

One month after Hinata returned to this world, for some reason Mariabelle also came here from the other world !! The reason she came here is to be with her beloved Hinata !! ~~~ With heavy love and a teaspoon of jealousy, she attacked Hinata every time he refused !! (in many ways).

Will Hinata, who has decided to live with the Yandere Mariabelle, be able to live safely (?) !! A sweet and thick romantic comedy woven around the dark elf beauty's slightly heavy schizophrenic love !!!

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
description.id: Hinata, seorang siswa SMA yang bereinkarnasi di dunia lain dan menjadi pahlawan dengan kekuatan Dewa. Mengalahkan Raja Iblis bersama Mariabel "Dark Elf", dan bersama teman-temannya. Penuhi keinginan Dewa dengan aman dan kembali ke dunia ini lagi. Satu bulan setelah itu, Hinata kembali ke dunianya, tetapi Mariabel juga datang ke sini dari dunia lain!! Alasan dia datang ke sini adalah untuk mengikuti Hinata yang dicintainya!! Dan hanya untuknya, Dia menyerang Hinata setiap kali dia menolaknya. cinta yang berat dan satu sendok teh kecemburuan!! (dalam banyak hal). Bisakah Hinata, yang telah memutuskan untuk hidup dengan Dark Elf, hidup dengan aman (?)!! Sebuah komedi romantis manis dan gravitasi yang menjalin dengan kecantikan Echizosic Dark Elf yang agak berat!!! (Manga ini terinpirasi dari manga H)
description.ja:
異世界に転生し、神の力で勇者になった高校生のヒナタ。ダークエルフのマリアベル、その仲間たちと共に魔王を討伐。無事、神の願いを叶えて現世へと帰還を果たす。
それから一カ月、現世に帰ったヒナタだったが、なぜかマリアベルが異世界からこちらに来てしまう!! こちらへ来た理由、それは愛しのヒナタと添い遂げるため!! しかも彼女、ヒナタにたいして少～～～～～しだけ重い愛と小さじ一杯分ぐらいの嫉妬心で事あるごとにヒナタを襲うのだった!!（色んな意味で）。
なし崩しでダークエルフと同棲することになったヒナタは無事（？）に暮らすことができるのか!!

ちょい重いダークエルフのエキゾチック美女と織りなす、甘くてグラビティな逆異世界同棲ラブコメ!!!

title.en: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.ja-ro: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi

altTitles.id: Kisah Antara Komite Lugu dan Gadis SMA dengan Rok yang Terlalu Pendek

altTitles.en: Story of the Useless Prefect and the High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

altTitles.ja: ポンコツ風紀委員とスカート丈が不適切なJKの話

altTitles.zh: 根筋的風紀委員與裙長不當的JK

altTitles.pt-br: A História Entre um Monitor Burro e uma Colegial com a Saia em um Cumprimento Inadequado

description.en:
Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.

And so this is a story of the two interacting with one another.
description.pt-br: Sakuradaimon é o monitor do colégio; um monitor é um aluno que é pode aplicar atos disciplinatórios. Como monitor ele deve ser um aluno modelo para os outros estudantes, mas infelizmente ele não é perfeito. Kohinata é uma das estudantes que o Sakuradaimon tenta disciplinar devido ao uso incorreto do uniforme escolar, mas até o presente momento ela foi desobediente. Esta é a história entre a interação entre os dois.

altTitles.ja: クソ女に幸あれ

description.en:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.ja: 「実は4股してるの　ごめんね」。中学時代、人生で初めての彼女にヒドイ振られ方をした秋吉直（あきよしすなお）。「もう誰かを好きになることなんてない」と思っていたが、大学生となり映画サークルの先輩・小河原菜摘（こがはらなつみ）に惹かれ始める。しかし、そんな折に元カノ・西川檸檬（にしかわれもん）と再会。しかも翌朝目が覚めると、身体が入れ替わっていて…!?
description.vi:
"T-tớ đã cắm sừng cậu, không chỉ một anh đâu...là ba anh lận cơ!"
Những câu nói như gai sắt cứa vào tim cậu từ cuối cấp hai năm ấy vẫn còn làm cậu ám ảnh. Akiyoshi Sunao, hiện tại cậu đã trở thành sinh viên năm nhất và làm thành viên của câu lạc bộ phim ảnh, cậu còn nỗi ám ảnh kia là từ mối tình đầu hồi cuối cấp hai của cậu, Lemon Nishikawa. Cậu đã mất niềm tin vào tình yêu suốt cả cao trung, đến khi lên đại học thì anh đã phải lòng crush mới hơn mình một tuổi tên Kogahara Natsumi. Ngay khi cậu nghĩ mình đã suýt thì "move on" và tìm được tình yêu mới để tận hưởng thanh xuân, "Cô bạn" bắt cá bốn tay năm nào lại vô tình xuất hiện. Khoảnh khắc ấy, những câu nói chí mạng như hiện về cứa cậu thêm phát nữa...Cậu đã cố gắng lảng tránh cô người yêu cũ ấy và cổ vũ bản thân vượt lên sự kiện mọc sừng ấy. Cậu suýt thì thành công...
"S-sao mình lại biến thành ghệ cũ của mình?!"
Cậu đã bị hoán đổi linh hồn với chính cô nàng người yêu cũ ấy, và đối phương cũng nhận ra điều đó. Họ phải làm gì để vượt qua nghịch cảnh? Liệu họ có nhìn nhận lại những góc khuất của nhau? Và liệu họ có trở lại với nhau? Mời các bạn đọc truyện nhé!~

Fun fact: Tiêu đề tiếng Nhật của truyện này có thể được dịch thẳng là "Hạnh Phúc Nhé, Con Đĩ!"
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

title.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---

title.en: Happy Family - Fukushuu no Rental Okaa-san

altTitles.ja: ハッピーファミリー 復讐のレンタルお母さん

altTitles.vi: Gia Đình Vui Vẻ - Mẹ Thuê Báo Oán

description.en: Excessive love, sex checks, and self-prioritizing toxic parents who treat their daughters as accessories. Exhausted by the selfishness of her toxic parents, the daughter turns to a "rental mother" service. The `Aida' who was sent to her is an ideal mother who is beautiful, kind, and competent! However, she's gradually entering into the family...!? Yeah, my family is being taken over.
description.ja: 過剰な愛の押し付け、セックスチェック、自分優先で娘をアクセサリー扱いする毒親。毒親のわがままに振り回されて疲労困憊の娘が頼った先は、「レンタルお母さん」というサービスだった。派遣されてきた`アイダ’さんは美人で優しくて有能な理想のお母さん！しかし、あの彼女はだんだんと家庭に入り込んできて…!?あぁ、私の家族が乗っ取られていく。
description.vi:
Airi, một nữ sinh trung học, người mỗi ngày luôn sầu não về Mari, người mẹ ích kỷ luôn đặt lợi ích của bản thân lên hàng đầu. Liên tục bị hành hạ tinh thần bởi người mẹ cuồng loạn đó, trái tim cô bé cứ thế chết dần. Tâm trạng của Airi càng sa sút khi buổi tư vấn trực tiếp giữa phụ huynh, học sinh và giáo viên được ấn định.
Thế rồi, Airi chợt nhớ đến một dịch vụ mà một người bạn giới thiệu có tên là "Dịch vụ mẹ thuê". Ban đầu, Airi bán tín bán nghi, nhưng vì quá tuyệt vọng nên cô bé đã nhấc máy. 
Sang ngày hôm sau, người mẹ cho thuê bí ẩn nhưng xinh đẹp "Aida" đã có mặt. Từ đó, kế hoạch "ăn thịt" gia đình Airi của "mẹ thuê Aida" bắt đầu.

title.en: Monster no Niku o Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken

altTitles.ja: モンスターの肉を食っていたら王位に就いた件

altTitles.en: How I Took The Throne After Eating Monster Meat

altTitles.ja: EAT or DIE

altTitles.ja-ro: Monster no Niku wo Kutte Itara Oui no Tsuita Ken

altTitles.en: How I Became King by Eating Monsters

description.en:
Mars, a 12-year-old prince, is terrified of being assassinated. His meals are constantly being poisoned, so he lives on monster meat.

Then one night, a beautiful red-haired woman appears and says to him,

“You have potential. Become my apprentice.”.

From a single misunderstanding, the boy becomes the most powerful king (even though he doesn't want to)!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiba](https://mangadex.org/author/a85a847d-d2d4-4a34-aea0-edcf7a56e8e9)
description.ja:
暗殺に怯える12歳の王子マルス。食事には毒が仕込まれているため、モンスターの肉を食べて生きていた。

そしてある夜、赤髪の美女が現れ告げる。

「おまえ、見込みがあるな。私の弟子になれ」

たった一つの勘違いから、少年は（全く望んでないのに）最強の王へと成り上がる――！

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi: Sui no Daibouken

altTitles.en: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill: Sui’s Great Adventure

altTitles.ja: とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ スイの大冒険

altTitles.vi: Cuộc phiêu lưu của bé Sui

description.en: A spin-off of the series TONDEMO SKILL DE ISEKAI HOUROU MESHI told from Sui's perspective.

altTitles.ja: お忍び同棲

description.en: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！
description.pt-br: Tae, uma linda garota de 17 anos, e Kotaro, um sério trabalhador de escritório. Essas duas pessoas aparentemente felizes têm um segredo que não podem revelar a ninguém - os ninjas rivais de Iga e Kouga vivem secretamente juntos nesta comédia romântica descontraída!

altTitles.ja: あまサドアンソロジー

description.en:
Intense stimulation and sweet temptation ♥

With the theme of "Being gently teased by a girl," these stories capture the moments when girls show a subtle sadistic charm in everyday life, offering sweet experiences without harsh insults or painful acts.

altTitles.ja: 日常

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...

title.en: A Divorced Crybaby Has Moved in Next Door

altTitles.ja: バツイチで泣き虫なおとなりさん
バツ泣き

description.en: Ochiai-San is an ordinary woman who recently went through a divorce. Years of marital neglect have chipped away at her self-esteem, making her more reserved and depressed. However, there is one light at the end of her tunnel - her next door neighbor, Sawatari-kun. Can he help bring her back out of her shell?
description.tr: Yeni boşanmış, ağlak komşu Ochiai-san ve Sawatari-kun'un yaşadıkları olayları anlatan seri.
description.pt-br: Ochiai-san é uma mulher comum que recentemente se divorciou. Anos de abandono conjugal prejudicaram sua autoestima, tornando-a mais reservada e deprimida. No entanto, há uma luz no fim do túnel, seu vizinho, Sawatari-kun. Ele pode ajudar a trazê-la de volta para fora de sua concha?
